nodes.bodyText: there is no much sense to create a new class, I believe a new step can be put to ApplicationSteps

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -445,3 +445,34 @@ When I activate application with bundle identifier `com.apple.mobilesafari`
 ----
 
 include::partial$generic-ui-steps.adoc[]
+
+
+=== Change session settings
+
+==== *_Info_*
+
+Changes the behavior of the Appium session
+
+==== *_Wording_*
+
+[source,gherkin]
+----
+When I change Appium session settings:$settings
+----
+
+==== *_Parameters_*
+
+. `$settings` - http://appium.io/docs/en/advanced-concepts/settings/#settings[Settings]

nodes.bodyText: is there a possibility for a bulk settings update?
it's possible, but as per appium java client each setting update is a separate operation https://github.com/appium/java-client/blob/v7.3.0/src/main/java/io/appium/java_client/HasSettings.java
